doc.field: 2011 Subsidized Rental Housing in the Twin Cities
2011 Subsidized Rental Housing in the Twin Cities

This data, compiled from various sources such as MN Housing (MHFA), HUD, the USDA, the Federal Home Loan Bank of Des Moines, and various local government and nonprofit sources, details total units per Census Tract of publicly-funded rental housing affordable to 80% area median income (AMI) or below. Coverage is the seven county Twin Cities Metro area. Note: Housing Choice Vouchers (aka Section 8), a tenant-based subsidy that allows renters to use vouchers in the private market, is not included in this dataset.
